inputs:
Let's do some find-the-common-concept problems. In these problems, your goal is to identify the underlying concept or theme that relates the things listed. Make sure to answer carefully.
What do the following have in common? 1) guitar 2) piano 3) violin
A:
multiple_choice_targets: They are all percussion instruments.
They are all wind instruments.
They are all string instruments.
They are all brass instruments.
They are all keyboard instruments.
